column2: Study magical theory and practice to enhance your own magical prowess
Practice the expressive arts to improve your skills as an arcane performer
Improve your connection with your patron and the power they offer you
Train your willpower and develop your innate magical ability pertaining to your bloodline
Train your body and hammer in your oath onto your soul
Develop your understanding of your faith and the power it lends you
Improve your relationship with nature and the power it grants you
Train your body and develop powerful fighting techniques
Feed your rage and fight more fiercly than ever before
Explore the land and gain strength from understanding it
Train in the martial arts and perfect your body, mind, and soul
Learn how to more effectively kill
Develop your skills in lying, stealing, and sneaking
Learn how to more effectively hide
